page.title: 09NEW PLAYGROUND GAMES,WARBOYS
page.content: These are some of the new playground games that we play in our school playground. In{Space Invaders}we have to line up against a wall. Someone stands in front of the line and throws a ball to try to hit someone else. When someone is hit, he has to throw the ball at the others. To play{Pacman}you need three or more players. It is a chase game and one person is{Pacman.}Everyone runs around on the lines of the netball court and{ {Pacman}chases them. Everyone has three lives and if a person sits down{Pacman can't get them. In{British Bulldog}everyone stands at one end of the playground and someone is 'it' at the other. Everybody has to get to the other side without being 'tigged'. If they are touched by the one who is 'it' they have to help him.
